DESCRIPTION: Manage labels for your mails to better organize your tickets.
EXTENDED_LINE_1: **{{prefix}}label create [Label Name] [Category ID]** ~ Creates a label with a unique name that will send mails to a category.
EXTENDED_LINE_2: **{{prefix}}label delete [Label Name]** ~ Deletes a label if you no longer need it.
EXTENDED_LINE_3: **{{prefix}}label list** ~ Lists all the labels you have on your server.
EXTENDED_LINE_4: **{{prefix}}label [Label Name]** ~ Use this in a mail channel to automatically move the channel to that category tied to this label.
USAGE: {{prefix}}label [create Or delete Or list] [Label Name] [Category ID]
ALIASES: Label does not have any aliases.
CREATE_NEED_CATEGORY: A category id must be provided in order to create a label. Use the `help label` to get help on how to use this command.
CREATED: The **{{name}}** label has been created on this server.
INVALID_NAME: The **{{name}}** label was not able to be found on this server.
DELETED: The **{{name}}** label has been deleted from this server.
NO_LABELS: There were no labels found on this server to list.
NOT_MAIL_CHANNEL: The labels can only be used to move a valid mail channel. This is not a mail channel.
REASON: Moved the channel as requested by the {{name}} label by {{author}}
MOVED: The mail has been labelled with the {{name}} label and moved to the corresponding category.
